data.title: Album Reviews: EP 221: Laugh Now & Cry Later , Travis Scott's Ghostwriter & the 2020 XXL Freshmen
data.meta_description: Topics this week: 2020 XXL Freshmen List, Obama's Summer playlist, Travis Scott's Ghostwriter, Nas throws shots at Doja Cat, Kim Kardashian tries to Free C-Murder, new music from Drake, the disrespect of DJ Screw & more! What it dew Trillions! Back again with episode 221 of the Truth Be Told Podcast hosted by Riffa, Black Todd & Bigg UU from Killeen. Thanks for supporting your favorite Hip Hop podcast! Be sure to leave a 5 star review! Support this podcast on Patreon:  We kick off this episode with more talk about Riffa's wildlife travels.  (7:00) XXL has released their 2020 Freshmen List and we break down some of the folks we've listened to as well as the ones we haven't yet. (15:45) Megan Thee Stallion and Cardi B's WAP has streaming numbers are through the roof. (19:45) Barack Obama's Summer Playlist is out. (25:16) Bigg UU goes on a rant about Apple News, Facebook Instant Articles, Google AMP.  (33:15) CyHi The Prynce may have been writing songs for Travis Scott. (40:00) Nas has a new song called Ultra Black produced by Hit-Boy and throws a shot at Doja Cat. We also speak about the game not respecting our legends. (1:09:01) The Dramatic Fresh Prince is on the way. (1:18:00) The new Tune Squad jerseys are out. (1:20:30) Kevin Hart and Will Smith are remaking a white ass movie. (1:25:00) All of the live cop shows are cancelled including COPS. (1:30:00) Ruff Ryders CEO reveal JAY-Z got rid of DMX's $12 million debt. (1:37:35) Kim Kardashian is vowing to get C-Murder out of jail. (1:51:30) Drake drops a new music video featuring Lil Durk.   We round out the episode speaking about new projects from Tech N9ne and Young Dolph. We also speak about Big K.R.I.T.'s new football song. (2:04:00) The culture needs to stop disrespecting DJ Screw.  Please join our new Facebook Group:  Show support for the podcast! Subscribe to our channel on YouTube:  PODCAST LINKS Website:   iTunes:  Google Podcasts:  Spotify:  Android:  Stitcher:   Libsyn:   SoundCloud:  FOLLOW US Website: Mixtapes:   Audio:   Videos:  Riffa on Twitter -  Bigg UU on Twitter -   TBT Pod on Twitter -  Instagram:   Facebook:   Tumblr:   Pinterest:  bigg uu, riffa, black todd, truth be told, killeen, texas, central texas, hip hop podcast, podcast, hip hop news, hip hop culture, album reviews, mixtape reviews, truth be told podcast, apple podcasts, google podcasts, spotify
data.text:
Topics this week: 2020 XXL Freshmen List, Obama's Summer playlist, Travis Scott's Ghostwriter, Nas throws shots at Doja Cat, Kim Kardashian tries to Free C-Murder, new music from Drake, the disrespect of DJ Screw & more!

What it dew Trillions! Back again with episode 221 of the Truth Be Told Podcast hosted by Riffa, Black Todd & Bigg UU from Killeen. Thanks for supporting your favorite Hip Hop podcast! Be sure to leave a 5 star review!

Support this podcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/join/truthbetoldpod

We kick off this episode with more talk about Riffa's wildlife travels.

(7:00) XXL has released their 2020 Freshmen List and we break down some of the folks we've listened to as well as the ones we haven't yet. (15:45) Megan Thee Stallion and Cardi B's WAP has streaming numbers are through the roof. (19:45) Barack Obama's Summer Playlist is out. (25:16) Bigg UU goes on a rant about Apple News, Facebook Instant Articles, Google AMP.

(33:15) CyHi The Prynce may have been writing songs for Travis Scott. (40:00) Nas has a new song called Ultra Black produced by Hit-Boy and throws a shot at Doja Cat. We also speak about the game not respecting our legends. (1:09:01) The Dramatic Fresh Prince is on the way. (1:18:00) The new Tune Squad jerseys are out. (1:20:30) Kevin Hart and Will Smith are remaking a white ass movie. (1:25:00) All of the live cop shows are cancelled including COPS.

(1:30:00) Ruff Ryders CEO reveal JAY-Z got rid of DMX's $12 million debt. (1:37:35) Kim Kardashian is vowing to get C-Murder out of jail. (1:51:30) Drake drops a new music video featuring Lil Durk.

We round out the episode speaking about new projects from Tech N9ne and Young Dolph. We also speak about Big K.R.I.T.'s new football song. (2:04:00) The culture needs to stop disrespecting DJ Screw.

Please join our new Facebook Group: http://bit.ly/tbtfacebook

Show support for the podcast!

Subscribe to our channel on YouTube: https://www.trillmatic.com/youtube
